doctor.name: Dr. A.S.M. Ekbal Hossain (Saeid)
doctor.specialty: ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) Specialist & Head Neck Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. A.S.M. Ekbal Hossain (Saeid is a dedicated ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) specialist and head neck surgeon in Rajshahi. He holds an MBBS, BCS (Health), and DLO from BSMMU, and currently serves as an Assistant Registrar in the ENT department at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Ekbal Hossain specializes in the treatment of various ENT-related conditions including sinusitis, nasal polyps, tonsillitis, allergic rhinitis, ear infections, hearing loss, vertigo, thyroid diseases, voice disorders, and head-neck tumors. He provides specialist consultations at Unique Diagnostic & Consultation Center, located opposite to Popular 2 Diagnostic, Laxmipur, Rajshahi. His chamber remains open from 2.30pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Opposite to Popular 2 Diagnostic, Laxmipur, Rajshahi
